channel.title: Yeetcode
channel.description: A small insight into the lives of people that are surrounded by technology day by day.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast by Yeetcode
channel.itunes:author: Birat Koirala

item.title: Episode 1 - Who am I?
item.itunes:author: Birat Koirala
item.description: This episode is an introduction to who I am, my way of thinking and what I aim to do with the podcast. Hop on to discover what type of lives people lead in and around the field of technology and innovation.

item.title: Episode 2 - Technology, Uni Life and Saving the Planet
item.itunes:author: Birat Koirala
item.description: Just a bunch of friends talking about life.

item.title: Episode 3 - Education, Purpose and Success
item.itunes:author: Birat Koirala
item.description:
In this episode, we explore how three people at very different stages in their life have the different experienced that they do. We look at limitations of education and exam systems in schools and institutions. We discuss how these limitations could be resolved. We proceed to discuss the purpose in life and what everyone thinks success is. Guests in this recording:
Ben Breen Abhay Pherali

item.title: Episode 4 - Education, Society and Objectivity
item.itunes:author: Birat Koirala
item.description:
In this episode, we welcome Prof. Tejendra Pherali into our podcast. We explore his background, his circumstances that led him to pursue a career in Education. We progressively explore the factors surrounding Education and Conflict and education as both victim and perpetrator. One of the factors being bias in education, we talk about the solutions we can bring. We finally end with a note on Society and Authenticity in and around the wave of individualism in the current younger generation of society. Guest(s) in this recording:
Prof. Tejendra Pherali
